info.title: STYLOGRAPH
info.subtitle: for the OS-9 operating system with MAIL MERGE and SPELLCHECK

legalnotice.para: This manual and the associated programs are the copyright of Dragon Data Ltd (under license). Copying is only permitted for backup purposes on a single computer system. Any other copying by whatever means without the written authorization of Dragon Data Ltd is strictly prohibited.
This manual was prepared using the STYLOGRAPH word processor, checked with the SPELL CHECK spelling checker, and printed with the MAIL MERGE merge/print program.
OS-9 and BASIC09 are trade marks of Microware Systems Corporation and Motorola Inc.

printhistory.para: Printed by Cleglen Publishing Ltd., Cardiff.
